title: Special Characters In NA Allowed?
body: i am thinking of changing my name and i want this symbol in it.  ยบ   ร    I saw in another post that it is available, but i am just checking.

replies.body: Each region has their own set of supported characters.  EU currently supports special characters, but it's not currently available on NA.  Let me know if that clears things up!

as far as i see, using another language to right your name is still fine but there are some characters out there that should not be able to be entered which i believe some players have modified either their keyboard settings to use or the client itself.

but the character you want to use looks fine to me since its part of another language.
